text:
Rain lashed many parts of Kashmir Valley, including Srinagar, even as meteorological department here predicted the wet weather spell to continue for two more days.

An officials of the met office said Srinagar recorded 12.8 mm of rainfall during the day, while Kupwara, in north Kashmir recorded 18.2 mm of rains, the official said. Gulmarg recorded 17.8 mm of rainfall during the day and 12 mm during the night. - PTI
title: Rain lashes Kashmir Valley
